# hypertension.md

Evidence-based information about high blood pressure (hypertension), management strategies, and treatment options.

## About This Site

hypertension.md provides clear, medically-reviewed information about high blood pressure — a condition affecting 47% of US adults. We explain blood pressure readings, causes, lifestyle interventions (DASH diet, exercise, sodium reduction), and medication options.

Part of the thrive.md health network.

## What We Offer

- **Blood pressure basics** — What BP readings mean, stages of hypertension, measurement guidelines
- **Lifestyle management** — DASH diet, exercise, sodium reduction, weight loss, stress management
- **Medication information** — ACE inhibitors, ARBs, beta blockers, diuretics, combination therapy
- **AI-powered Q&A** — Ask questions, get answers sourced from cardiology research
- **Resources** — Home BP monitors, DASH meal plans, cardiologist directories
- **Articles** — White coat hypertension, resistant hypertension, BP medication side effects

## Medical Disclaimer

This site provides medical *information*, not medical *advice*. Blood pressure management requires professional medical supervision. Always consult healthcare providers for diagnosis and treatment decisions.
